modName: Prisoner Clothes for UNP Top Model with TBBP
summary: Prisoner clothes for the UNP Top Model body with TBBP.
descriptionHtml:
Why? Because I like to see my character with the body I installed from character creation onward and I need the practice.

I had an optional file with other armors but I took it down because they were not complete.
[color=#FF0000]I've removed the "Optional File" for now because I'd like to possibly finish it and re-upload it here or in another file.[/color] This is my first time uploading a mod and I am new to armor conversions so any tips, tricks, hints, criticisms, or suggestions are more than welcome.

[color=#FFFF00][b]Included in these files:[/b][/color] Only Body / Cuirass meshes
Prisoner Clothes (Main file)


[color=#33CC00][i]Weight Slider compatible. [/i][/color]

Please if you use or enjoy these conversions upload some images and / or give some feedback. Like I said this is my first so I'd like to hear what others think.

[size=32][color=#FF0000]Required:[/color][/size]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41051/?]UNP Top Model Body[/url] by es2

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34713/?]The TBBP Animation of Dragonfly[/url] by Lecid

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/?]XP32 Skeleton[/url] by XP32

I'm no expert but I'm pretty sure since these were created using the TBBP version of the Top Model body, if you don't have a compatible skeleton you will probably CTD.

Suggested Mods: These are the mods I use and I managed to take care of most clipping.

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7093/?]No MaaM Breathing Idles[/url] by Fore

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34508/?]360 Walk and Run Plus[/url] by Yukl

Also here are some armors I've done for Top Model
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52221/?]Ancient Nord Armor[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52015/?]Brokefoots UNP Mashup[/url]


[size=25][center][color=#000099]Credits and thanks![/color][/center][/size]
Bethesda for a great game!
Nightasy for his tutorials.
Dimon99 for the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?]UNP Body[/url]
es2 for the Top Model body.
LeCid for the TBBP animation.
XP32 for the Skeleton.
Blender.
Nifskope
All the people of the internet who help folks like me in forums etc...your kindness was detrimental to this work and any work I do in the future in this endeavor.
author: MasterChitlin
